content: this is a basic beginner level pattern for those of you who are new to knitting and the techniques you will need to know are knit purl and casting on this ribbed hat pattern is an excellent project for anyone who is learning how to knit not too bulky and not too light this hat is comfortable to wear on any occasion and it is unisex too the pdf has the pattern with and without the step-by-step photographs yarn 1 x the petite wool in spotted mauve from we are knitters each ball is 100 gr per 140 m 100% peruvian wool the yarn weight is bulky/chunky/12 ply needles set of 6 mm us 10 knitting needles please note this hat is knit flat back and forth on straight needles skills level basic this is a basic level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch purl stitch k2tog p2tog and casting on sizing there are seven sizes to make head circumference/hat circumference is written in inches baby 0-3 months - 13-15 baby 3-12 months - 15-18 1-2 years toddler - 18-19 3-12 years child - 19-21 teen/adult small - 21-22 adult medium - 22-24 adult large - 24-26 don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern or any items created using the directions in this pattern without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information 1 https //www handylittleme com/how-to-knit-a-hat/ 2 https //www handylittleme com/product/beginner-beanie-hat-pattern-pdf/
